channel.title: [718] AlbusX - A true Legion [718]
channel.description:
Hello, I'm starting a 718 Server that is mainly focused on Economy; Which will consist of PvM and Skilling. These are the two things I'm focusing on. Eventually will work on PvP but that will come after PvM and Skilling are what I want to achieve.
I've recruited [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=337769]KempiScape[/url] to the development team, he is a massive addition to the team. Looking for one more person to help with the development.
We're dedicated and have got a lot of time and I guarantee that this server will succeed with adequate people.
[b]Requirements[/b] - You Must have Skype. - You Must have good English and Grammar. - You Must be a good Programmer. - You Must not be here for the money, but the experience of the game. - You Must be active In-Game, on the Forums and active with Programming. - You Must be Older then 15 (Unless you can prove you aren't Immature).
[B]Media[/B] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/avsz2d.png[/img]
[b]Updates[/b] - 100% Slayer added. - 85% Money Pouch added. - 100% Ring of Wealth added. - 100% Inferno Adze added. - 100% Agility Shortcuts added. - 100% Resource Dungeons added. - Rare Drop Table added. - Player Owned House added.
All developers will be connected with either DropBox or GitHub depends on how I like the use of both. Developers will be required to Program in an IDE (IntelliJ, Eclipse or NetBeans).
If you have anymore questions PM me.
My Skype: Jackson.Albusx

item.title: [718] AlbusX - A true Legion [718]
item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

I do want to talk to people, I just don’t have time to waste. I replyed you didn’t respond I gave you time and removed you. I’m busy.

Read full topic

item.title: [718] AlbusX - A true Legion [718]
item.dc:creator: @zeropointx zeropointx
item.description:
@zeropointx wrote:

Hmm I wanted to talk to him, but he he seemed very angry like “[12:19:34 PM] Jack: Who’s this?
[12:19:58 PM] zeropointx: hi
[12:19:58 PM] Jack: ??”

“[12:27:35 PM] Jack: Whats your name on rune-server
[12:41:05 PM] Jack: 1 minute before i delete u” And just removed when I had to do some work. I am warning you… He doesn’t want to talk to anybody…

Read full topic

Add my skype.
